com.netcracker.tc.configurator.data
Class AnnotationSchemaReader

java.lang.Object
  com.netcracker.tc.configurator.data.AnnotationSchemaReader

public class AnnotationSchemaReader
extends Object

This class represents logic for analyzing test scenario classes and collect it's information into Schemas.

Test cases class must be annotated with Scenarios, public non-static methods of this class, annotated with Scenario will be mapped into Schema object.

Author:
Aleksej Dsiuba
See Also:
com.netcracker.tc.tests.anns
